verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--'rājā kene karaye tāḍana?'
tabe sei loka kahe saba vivaraṇa

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; rājā—the King; kene—why; karaye tāḍana—punishes; tabe—thereupon; sei loka—those persons; kahe—stated; saba vivaraṇa—all of the description.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu inquired, "Why is the King chastising him?" Thereupon the people described the entire incident.
